title: B&D Creations
description: B&D Creations is a mini e-commerce platform built with the MERN stack, made for art students to showcase and sell their artwork online. It features a product gallery, shopping cart, admin panel, and contact form with email notifications. The site is fully responsive, user-friendly, and designed to help young artists promote their work easily.
techStack: HTML, CSS, tailwind, React Js, Node js, Mongo DB

title: Auto_Rescue
description: This is an Automatic Door Locking System operated via voice command, built using an Arduino Uno, AI Thinker module, car door actuator, and other basic components.

title: Mini Ecommmerce Website
description: A simple Mini E-Commerce Web App built with the MERN stack. Includes an admin panel for product management and a customer panel with cart and checkout features. Supports local image uploads, cart persistence, and a clean, responsive UI.
techStack: HTML, CSS, tailwind, React Js, Node js, Mongo DB

title: Biometric-EVM
description: Biometric EVM is a secure electronic voting machine prototype that uses fingerprint or biometric verification to authenticate voters. It helps prevent impersonation and ensures only eligible voters can cast their votes, making the election process safer and more reliable.
techStack: Arduino Mega, Analog Display, Finger Print sensor, RTC module;

title: Door Locking System Via Voice Command
description: Door Locking System is a simple security solution that uses electronic controls to lock and unlock doors. It can include features like password entry, biometric verification, or RFID for safer and more convenient access to your home or office.
techStack: Arduino Uno, AI Thinker, Car Door Lock Actuator

title: Object Avoider
description: This is a simple yet effective project based on the Arduino Uno and sensors like the ultrasonic sensor — you could say it's similar to sonar. It uses sound waves to detect obstacles and automatically changes direction to avoid them.

title: Chatter
description: A Simple chatting application built on Mongodb and express js in order to learn the basic CRUD operations.

title: Netflix-clone
description: A simple practicing project of Netflix-clone made with HTML and CSS, only for demonstrating some practice sets and for understanding the basics of ui desings

title: Spotify Clone with Media Player
description: This is a simple clone of the Spotify application, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Along with replicating Spotify’s UI, I also developed a media player that allows users to add their own media files and albums.

title: Student crud app
description: Simple demonstration and practice of CRUD operations with the help of MongoDB, react JS, node JS
